title: Installation of common Television Transmission Reception/Antenna and Ducting for telecommunication lines and optical fiber cable for Digital Data communication/transmission shall be made
clause_text: Installation of common Television Transmission Reception/Antenna and Ducting for telecommunication lines and optical fiber cable for Digital Data communication/transmission shall be made. Ducting for laying of piped gas connection service in the surrounding of building.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Installation of common Television Transmission Reception/Antenna and Ducting for telecommunication lines and optical fiber cable for Digital Data communication/transmission shall be made.
